title: Edhi nee baahu
sahitya:
Edi nI bAhu bala parAkrama mennAlla kennALLu



anupallavi



 AdidEva nijadAsulaku gana nAsayuNDaga karivarada



caraNam 1



karamuna merayu sharacApamu yA kali gonalEdA

     murakhara shUnita pAnamu bahudinamulu gAlAdA vAdA



caraNam 2



sarasa bhUsurula bAdhalu vini rOsamu rAlEdA

     moraliDagA yOganiddura nilipi mOmu jUpa rAdA vAdA



caraNam 3



varasadappu buddhulu nIculaku vaccinadi teliyadA

     verapu lEka dirigEru cAlanucu vEgamE shrI tyAgarAja sannuta (Adi)
